EnumValidationRule - Interface in uk.pallas.systems.typr.entities.v1.validation

V

ValidationRule - Interface in uk.pallas.systems.typr.entities.v1.validation
A field definition can have multiple validation rules applied to it, this provides an interface to allow those to be managed via composition.
